homePage.name: sadegh hadipour
homePage.about:
I am a front-end developer with over 4 years of experience in the technology industry. I have actively
participated in developing web user interfaces for various users. To achieve the goals of clients,
I work with HTML/CSS/JS, Vue.js, and Angular.
I enjoy designing user interfaces and am looking for an opportunity to work in a company that
seeks to further develop the user interface. I appreciate individuals who are active in the
technology industry and can help me present the best possible user interface to my employers.

Work Experience:

Front-end Developer - Company Filio - 21.1.2022 to 23.8.2022
1. Programmed with JavaScript to build the Google Map Layer section of the application.
2. Implemented user interfaces (UI) using HTML/CSS/JS.
3. Implemented user interfaces with Vue.js and Quasar .
4. Executed design layouts with a focus on UX and UI.

Skills:

1. HTML/CSS/JS 2. Bootstrap 3. Tailwind CSS
4. VueJs 5. Vuetify 6. Angular
7.NodeJs 8. ExpressJs 9. MongoDB 10. Mongoose
11. Git 12. Github 13. Gitlab

Education:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering, Shahrood University of Technology, 2016-2021
